title: Ecostyle
summary: A full-stack e-commerce platform built with React and Firebase, featuring both customer-facing and admin-facing interfaces. Ecostyle enables users to shop sustainable fashion and provides store owners with tools to manage inventory, orders, and product listings efficiently.
overview: Ecostyle is a modern sustainability-focused e-commerce website that supports ethical fashion. The platform includes a responsive storefront where customers can browse, purchase, and track eco-friendly clothing. On the backend, a dedicated admin dashboard allows store owners to manage products, view order details, update inventory, and monitor customer activity. With real-time updates via Firebase and secure payments through Stripe, Ecostyle provides a complete shopping and store management experience.

keyFeatures.title: Customer-Facing Storefront
keyFeatures.description: Intuitive and responsive interface for customers to browse products using filters for gender, type, and size; view detailed product pages with size guides; and add items to their cart or wishlist.

keyFeatures.title: Streamlined Checkout Experience
keyFeatures.description: Customers can manage their address book, choose from multiple shipping and payment options, and securely complete purchases through a simplified cart and checkout process.

keyFeatures.title: Seller Dashboard
keyFeatures.description: Comprehensive dashboard for sellers to add, edit, or delete products; manage orders; update product categories and collections; and edit size charts with real-time status updates.

keyFeatures.title: Account Management
keyFeatures.description: Both customers and sellers can manage personal information, saved addresses, payment methods, and track order history through a unified 'My Account' section.

challenges.title: Dual Interface Structure
challenges.description: Designing and managing two distinct user experiences: a smooth, user-friendly storefront for shoppers and a robust admin dashboard for store owners.

challenges.title: Stripe Integration
challenges.description: Implementing secure and seamless payments using the Stripe API, including handling edge cases like payment failures, address mismatches, and multi-currency support.

challenges.title: Backend Security & Access Control
challenges.description: Ensuring secure authentication and proper role-based access control for customer and admin users, while protecting sensitive data stored in Firebase.

challenges.title: Real-Time Inventory & Order Management
challenges.description: Synchronizing product listings and order statuses in real time using Firebase Firestore and Realtime Database, while maintaining consistency across multiple clients.

techStacks.name: React
techStacks.description: Used to build both the customer-facing storefront and admin dashboard with reusable, component-based architecture.

techStacks.name: Firebase
techStacks.description: Handles user authentication, real-time data sync, and database management for both front and backend.

techStacks.name: Stripe
techStacks.description: Enables secure online payments and processes checkout flows with support for multiple payment methods.

techStacks.name: CSS Modules
techStacks.description: Used for writing modular and maintainable styles scoped to individual components.
